circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF East Wretham at 1955LT on an operation to Hamburg. It was shot down by a Me.110 and crashed in Andervenne. All six crew members were killed. 
Crew:
Sgt Zdenek Babicek,
Sgt Alois Jarnot, 
Sgt Jan Miklosek,
F/O Mojmir Sedlacek,
Sgt Vilem Soukup,
P/O Antonin Zimmer.
probable_cause: Shot down by a German fighter.
